sentences.sentence: A missing or illegible name will nullify your vote.
sentences.translation: 遗漏或字迹难以辨认的名字会使你的投票无效。

sentences.sentence: Judges were unwilling to nullify government decisions.
sentences.translation: 法官们不愿废止政府决定。

sentences.sentence: An unhealthy diet will nullify the effects of training.
sentences.translation: 不健康的饮食会抵消锻炼的效果。
